Audio Booster for HBO is an innovative extension for the Chrome browser ğŸŒ that allows you to increase the maximum volume of the sound played on HBO. Easily adjust the volume using the ğŸšï¸ slider or predefined buttons in the extension pop-up menu to achieve optimal sound levels. ğŸ”Š

Functions
ğŸ”¹ Volume Boost: Adjust the volume according to your needs.
ğŸ”¹ Predefined Levels: Choose from preset volume settings for quick adjustments.
ğŸ”¹ Compatibility: Specially designed for use with HBO

How to use? ğŸ› ï¸

Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Open your favorite movie or series on HBO ğŸ¬
Click the extension icon in the browser bar. ğŸ–±ï¸
Use the slider or pre-defined buttons in the extension's pop-up menu to increase the volume. ğŸ§
